entities.name: thicknesse
entities.description: The Minister of Magic, mentioned as saying that blood traitors are as bad as Mudbloods.

entities.name: runcorn
entities.description: A Ministry official, greeted by Harry and mentioned as being tall.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character, who is trying to sneak into the Ministry of Magic.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and accomplice in their plan to get inside the Ministry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's other friend and accomplice in their plan to get inside the Ministry.

relationships.description: Harry greeted Thicknesse as he passed by.
Runcorn was so tall that Harry had to stoop to hide his feet.
